Sementara itu, Shen Jiamin mendapat tahu bahawa bapanya, Shen Weijie, berhasrat untuk berbaik semula dengan ibunya, Puan Huang, dan dia menenangkan bapanya dengan berjanji untuk melakukan yang terbaik bagi mengaturkan pertemuan tersebut.

programme.title: Doa Emak
programme.desc: Emak Ilham memerlukan kos rawatan hospital yang tinggi. Irgun cuba meminjam dengan majikannya namun tidak dapat. programme.title: Menu Viral

programme.title: Banglo Berkunci
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang 3 orang anak muda, Danny, Boy dan Adam yang suka melakukan aktiviti paranormal. Mereka gemar memilih tempat-tempat mistik untuk mencari kepastian tentang adakah benar hantu itu wujud. Satu hari mereka telah pergi ke sebuah banglo, dimana banglo tersebut mempunyai sejarah hitam. Penghuni banglo itu dikatakan telah membunuh ahli keluarganya tanpa sedar, dan perkara tersebut telah viral di laman sosial.

programme.title: Aura Bintang
programme.desc: Aura bintang membawakan kisah selebriti khususnya yang mejurus kepada perubahan positif yang wujud setelah mereka berhijrah. Rancangan ini merangkumi 4 segmen iaitu hijrah, addin, islam dan kifayah. Episod kali ini Dayah Bakar akan membawa penonton menemu bual dengan Diana Amir.

programme.title: Puji Pujian & Kalam Allah V1
programme.desc: Zikir dan bacaan surah-surah lazim.

programme.title: Religious Clip
programme.desc: Dalam episod kali ini, topik yang di sampaikan ialah “Tanda-tanda Keikhlasan dalam Beribadah kepada Islam”. Bersama Dai Hazman yang akan membincangkan topik ini dengan lebih lanjut lagi.

programme.title: Doa Emak
programme.desc: Santi seorang penyanyi dangdut yang dipaksa oleh suaminya untuk menghiburkan lelaki lain. Orang kampung memandang serong dengannya kerana penampilannya yang seksi dan dianggap menggoda lelaki lain. Santi melarikan diri kerana suaminya hendak menjual dia dengan orang lain.

programme.title: Bukan Salahku
programme.desc: Hashim yang tidak pernah berkahwin memutuskan untuk menamatkan zaman bujangnya bersama janda kaya iaitu Salina. Kemuliaan hati dan kealiman yang dimiliki Hashim membuatkan Salina yakin yang Hashim mampu membimbing dia dan anaknya, Julia ke jalan Allah. Bagi Julia, Hashim hanyalah lelaki tua yang miskin cuba menumpang kekayaan ibunya. Julia juga benci dengan sikap alim Hashim yang sentiasa cuba membimbingnya. Kehadiran Hashim membuatkan Julia rasa terpinggir apabila ibunya terlalu mempercayai dan mendahulukan Hashim berbanding dirinya.

programme.title: Religious Clip
programme.desc: Dalam episod kali ini, topik yang di sampaikan ialah “Suami dan Isteri”. Bersama Ustaz Syamsul Debat yang akan membincangkan topik ini dengan lebih lanjut lagi.

programme.title: Kembara Muslim
programme.desc: Kembara Muslim sebuah dokumentari yang dibawakan khas oleh Ustaz Safwan dan episod kali ini Ustaz akan membawa para penonton melawat negeri Terengganu dan akan menonjolkan ikon menarik dan tempat pelancongan di setiap negeri serta membuka mata dan hati penonton untuk menghargai seitap masjid yang tedapat di Malaysia.

programme.title: Jom Tengok

programme.desc: Episod kali ini, Cef Fendi membawa penonton ke negeri Sembilan untuk mendekati proses membuat tauhu dan akan berkongsi resepi ringkas membuat menu Tauhu Popia.

programme.title: Jom Jalan
programme.desc: Jom Jalan akan membawa Selebriti tanah air ke serata pelusuk tanah air. Pada setiap episod Selebriti akan membawa penonton ke destinasi menarik yang meliputi lokasi percutian, lokasi bersejarah, membeli belah dan makanan tempatan. Pada minggu ni Jom Jalan membawa penonton ke negeri Selangor

programme.title: Police File
programme.desc: Dalam episod kali ini Police File 2 membawa tajuk “Cinta Siber” di mana penceritaan berdasarkan kes sebenar fail polis Bukit Aman berkenaan kes yang telah diselesaikan. Memaparkan jenayah yang pernah berlaku di Malaysia menurut kronologi kejadian dari siasatan sehingga ke penghakiman.

programme.title: Setiaku Di Sini
programme.desc: Datin K marah Rayyan kerana meninggalkan Fara di malam perkawinan mereka. Rayyan memberi alasan yang dia tidak mencintai Fara. Fara sedar dirinya tidak dicintai tetapi dia pasrah dan berusaha untuk mengambil hati Rayyan. Datin K rasa bersalah kepada Rayyan dan Fara. Dia yang menyebabkan mereka terpaksa berkahwin walaupun tanpa kerelaan Rayyan.

programme.title: Banglo Berkunci
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang 3 orang anak muda, Danny, Boy dan Adam yang suka melakukan aktiviti paranormal. Mereka gemar memilih tempat-tempat mistik untuk mencari kepastian tentang adakah benar hantu itu wujud. Satu hari mereka telah pergi ke sebuah banglo, dimana banglo tersebut mempunyai sejarah hitam. Penghuni banglo itu dikatakan telah membunuh ahli keluarganya tanpa sedar, dan perkara tersebut telah viral di laman sosial.

programme.title: Bacaan Al-quran V1
programme.desc: Bacaan ayat suci Al Quran

programme.title: Jom Tengok

programme.title: Puji Pujian & Kalam Allah V2

programme.title: Religious Clip

programme.title: Sumpahan Kum Kum
programme.desc: Mila yang berasa tertekan dengan rupanya telah pergi berjumpa seorang bomoh untuk memperbaiki wajahnya. Mila perlu mematuhi peraturan yang telah ditetapkan. Namun, Mila melanggar peraturan tersebut dan wajahnya kembali menjadi hodoh. Mila kemudian berjumpa semula dengan bomoh itu dan diberitahu bahawa dia perlu meminum darah sembilan gadis perawan.

programme.title: Periuk Belanga

programme.title: Religious Clip

programme.title: Cik Shopaholic
programme.desc: Bella, Seorang wanita kaki shopping berdepan masalah kewangan dan cinta apabila tabiat borosnya mula menggugat kerjaya serta hubungannya dengan lelaki idaman (Emir).

programme.title: Tok Guru
programme.desc: Tok Guru Nik Ahmad ajak Cikgu Roslan mengajar ilmu alam di pondoknya. Che mat sakit hati dpat tahu Nik Naimah mula rapat dengan Cikgu Roslan. Che Mat buat fitnah Tok Guru tukar sistem pengajian pondok dengan masukkan matapelajaran yang diajar cikgu Roslan guna tulisan rumi dan bukan tulisan Jawi. Tok Guru Wan Ismail dan Tok Guru Mustapa hasil maklumat Che mat tuduh Tok Guru Nik Ahmad degil, keras kepala dan gedebe kerana nak tukar tradisi pengajian pondok.

programme.title: Makmum Yang Paling Aku Cinta
programme.desc: Amru dan Nailufar kembali bersatu. Amru kembali menjadi imam kepada satu-satu makmum yang paling dicintainya. Nailufar bersedia untuk berhadapan dengan semua dan mahu Amru berkongsi segala rasa susah dan senang bersamanya. Amru terharu dan bersyukur. Amru dengan berani membawa Nailufar ke rumahnya dan memperkenalkan Nailufar secara rasmi. Datin Amna bengang dan tidak mahu berhadapan dengan Nailufar mahupun Dato' Syed Qassim. Dato' Syed Qassim tersedar bahawa ada yang mengintip Amru di sebalik rumahnya namun dia dicederakan. Dato' Syed Qassim dimasukkan ke dalam hospital dan disitu dia dan Amru saling meluahkan rasa. Amru pula berkongsi rasa gembira apabila dimaklumkan Nailufar sedang hamil. Megat meminta Amru menghantar Nailufar ke kampung kerana bimbang keselamatan gadis itu. Amru dan Nailufar berpisah sekali lagi. Hamdan dikunjungi oleh Syed Qazim dan terkejut melihat Syazlina.

programme.title: Titi Kayu
programme.desc: Alim, seorang pemuda Cina Peranakan yang disenangi penduduk kampung atas sikap ringan tulang, mengorbankan masa dan tenaga demi membina titi kayu bersama seorang budak bernama Umar, meskipun tidak mendapat sokongan ketua kampung.

programme.title: Spirits War
programme.desc: "Spirit War" menceritakan tentang petualangan yang berlangsung di tanah perbatasan Siam yang penuh kedamaian dan kebahagiaan, hingga Tuan Panwa memutuskan untuk menambang gunung di Dekat Hutan Kegelapan. Sedikit yang Tuan Panwa tahu bahwa gunung tersebut adalah situs sebuah tanah pemakaman kuno.

programme.title: Fobia Malam Pertama
programme.desc: Fobia Malam Pertama menceritakan tentang Zaty, pelajar sebuah kolej tempatan di Pulau Pinang yang fobia untuk bercinta.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP10
programme.desc: Polis mengatur rancangan untuk memerangkap Amir. Tan Seri Jamaludin hilang sabar kerana Uda masih gagal mendapatkan tanda tangan Zacky. Dia memberhentikan semua kemudahan kewangan Zacky serta mengupah orang melanggar Uda. Sementara itu Zacky berjaya memikat Alia dan sempat menyampaikan hasrat untuk memilikinya. Alia mula terasa pernah melalui hidup bersama Zacky. Emosi dan fikirannya Alia semakin terganggau dan keliru sehingga mengalamai depresi. Sophie pula tidak sabar memiliki Zacky untuk mengaut harta. Rafeeq mengarah orang-orang untuk terus menjejaki Zacky dan Alia

programme.title: Dabbe Bir Cin Vakasi
programme.desc: Rumah sebuah keluarga di Turki dirasuk roh jahat yang ingin membunuh manusia.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP9
programme.desc: Zacky selamat setelah dirawat oleh Dr Zakir dan Dr Flora. Sementara itu Alia mula terganggu dengan Zacky dan orang-orang yang memanggil namanya Affi. Ritz masih tetap merahsiakan idenditi Alia kerana bimbang dia disakiti. Alia mula meragui idenditinya lalu bertindak untuk menyiasat. Dalam situasi berasingan, sepasukan polis giat menyiasat kes-kes lama berkaitan kehilangan dan kematian wanita yang tidak dapat dikesan. Amir menjadi suspek utama mereka

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP10
programme.desc: Polis mengatur rancangan untuk memerangkap Amir. Tan Seri Jamaludin hilang sabar kerana Uda masih gagal mendapatkan tanda tangan Zacky. Dia memberhentikan semua kemudahan kewangan Zacky serta mengupah orang melanggar Uda. Sementara itu Zacky berjaya memikat Alia dan sempat menyampaikan hasrat untuk memilikinya. Alia mula terasa pernah melalui hidup bersama Zacky. Emosi dan fikirannya Alia semakin terganggau dan keliru sehingga mengalamai depresi. Sophie pula tidak sabar memiliki Zacky untuk mengaut harta. Rafeeq mengarah orang-orang untuk terus menjejaki Zacky dan Alia

programme.title: Tuyul
programme.desc: Daniel dan Mia berpindah ke rumah ibu Mia selepas ibunya meninggal dunia. Selepas membersihkan salah satu bilik, Daniel menemui sebotol yang tersembunyi secara misteri di bawah lantai kayu. Botol kosong itu mungkin merupakan rumah kepada makhluk menakutkan yang berpotensi membahayakan Daniel, Mia dan bayi mereka yang belum lahir.

programme.title: The Equalizer S2 EP5
programme.desc: McCall diupah oleh sekumpulan jenayah sebenar dalam talian untuk mencari "stalker" seorang wanita Bandar Raya New York yang tidak curiga apabila penjenayah itu mendakwa dia akan membunuhnya dalam masa lapan jam.

programme.title: The Equalizer S2 EP6
programme.desc: Tentera Mel terbukti kritikal apabila McCall diupah oleh D.A. untuk mencari penembak tepat. Delilah mengalami PTSD akibat kejadian tembakan itu.

programme.title: The Equalizer S2 EP7
programme.desc: Bishop datang ke Pasukan McCall untuk meminta bantuan apabila seseorang dari masa lalunya datang untuk anak lelakinya yang sudah dewasa. Aunt Vi menjadi nostalgia tentang hubungan romantik masa lalu apabila dia menerima tetamu mengejut.

programme.title: The Equalizer S2 EP8
programme.desc: McCall dan Mel membantu seorang wanita yang dihantar pulang menjejaki anak lelakinya selepas dia dipisahkan daripadanya semasa mencari suaka di sempadan A.S. Selain itu, Mel, McCall dan Bishop menggunakan segala cara untuk membebaskan Harry dari penjara.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP10
programme.desc: Polis mengatur rancangan untuk memerangkap Amir. Tan Seri Jamaludin hilang sabar kerana Uda masih gagal mendapatkan tanda tangan Zacky. Dia memberhentikan semua kemudahan kewangan Zacky serta mengupah orang melanggar Uda. Sementara itu Zacky berjaya memikat Alia dan sempat menyampaikan hasrat untuk memilikinya. Rafeeq mengarah orang-orang untuk terus menjejaki Zacky dan Alia

programme.title: Black Warrant
programme.desc: Seorang pembunuh upahan operasi khas separa bersara dan seorang ejen DEA bertemu dalam misi berasingan untuk menghentikan organisasi pengganas siber yang telah membina mesin berbahaya yang mengancam untuk menyerang grid kuasa dan membawa bencana kepada dunia.

programme.title: Bisikan Syaitan
programme.desc: Pasangan Kamil dan Soraya mengikat perjanjian berdarah dengan kuasa jahat demi kemewahan, tetapi apabila Soraya ditangkap atas kes pembunuhan, rahsia mereka mula terbongkar dan gangguan ghaib menimpa keluarga.

programme.title: Janin
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Aisya yang baru kehilangan anak akibat keguguran dan mula diganggu oleh bayangan serta suara misteri yang memanggilnya “ibu”. Suaminya, Farid, cuba membantu namun keadaan menjadi semakin buruk apabila rahsia lama yang disembunyikan mula terbongkar — bahawa roh janin itu menuntut keadilan atas dosa masa lalu mereka.

programme.title: Dabbe Bir Cin Vakasi
programme.desc: Rumah sebuah keluarga di Turki dirasuk roh jahat yang ingin membunuh manusia.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit 2
programme.desc: Adnan, seorang penunggang motosikal jalanan yatim piatu yang dijaga oleh ibu saudaranya. Sebaliknya, Nadia dilahirkan dalam keluarga kaya dan kini memiliki pekerjaan yang stabil. Kedua-dua insan yang berbeza ini bertemu secara kebetulan dan akhirnya menjalin hubungan. Kini, dalam "Adnan Sempit 2", Shaheizy Sam kembali memegang watak sebagai Adnan, mengisahkan cabaran dan dugaan dalam kehidupannya serta hubungannya dengan Nadia.

programme.title: Munafik
programme.desc: Adam merupakan seorang pengamal perubatan Islam yang tidak dapat menerima hakikat isterinya sudah tiada di dunia ini. Kemudian, dia bersetuju untuk merawat seorang wanita yang tertekan bernama Maria tetapi perkara aneh dan meresahkan mula berlaku.

programme.title: Balada
programme.desc: Desa mewarisi sebidang tanah hasil penglibatan arwah ayahnya dalam politik tanah air - namun perlu ditebus tanah tersebut. Tidak mahu tanah itu beralih ke tangan orang lain, Desa perlu mencari wang secukupnya. Desa mula berhijrah ke Kuala Lumpur untuk mencari wang dengan bakatnya.

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: Zainab dan Zabidi merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang dikurniakan dua orang anak lelaki. Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Reaksiar
programme.desc: Program yang memaparkan perkongsian pengalaman dan reaksi artis-artis jemputan setelah melihat kembali klip-klip lakonan mereka.

programme.title: One,Two,Trivia
programme.desc: Sebuahprogram yang merungkai fakta-fakta menarik yang tersimpan dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan

programme.title: Ruang Temu
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Abdul Razak Mohaideen dan Saiful Apek yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi mereka berkaitan pengalaman mereka di dalam industri seni

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Jeritan Batinku
programme.desc: Fauziah, seorang anak yatim yang sering didera ibu saudaranya, Ramlah, nekad melarikan diri ke bandar. Tindakannya itu telah membawanya ke Sharif yang bertindak menjadikannya sebagai anak angkat. Namun, kehadiran Fauziah tidak disenangi Mahani. Sikap cemburu Mahani hanya membawa padah kepada dirinya. Selain itu, perasaan serba salah Ramlah menyebabkannya mengalami tekanan jiwa. Mampukah Fauziah mengecapi kebahagiaan?

programme.title: Reaksiar
programme.desc: Program yang memaparkan perkongsian pengalaman dan reaksi artis-artis jemputan setelah melihat kembali klip-klip lakonan mereka.

programme.title: One,Two,Trivia
programme.desc: Sebuahprogram yang merungkai fakta-fakta menarik yang tersimpan dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan

programme.title: Ruang Temu
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Abdul Razak Mohaideen dan Saiful Apek yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi mereka berkaitan pengalaman mereka di dalam industri seni

programme.title: Ceritaku Ceritamu
programme.desc: Gadis kampung yang memasang cita-cita tinggi untuk mencari pekerjaan di ibu kota. Berpengetahuan dalam bidang fesyen, dia ingin membina masa depan yang lebih cerah buatnya. Setelah berhijrah, Hasnah/Ana bertemu seorang lelaki dan menjalin hubungan bersamanya - namun dia sudah berkahwin dan mempunyai anak sebaya dengannya.

programme.title: Sayang Ibu
programme.desc: Setelah kematian bapa akibat satu kebakaran, kehidupan Tiara dan ibunya menjadi semakin sulit. Mereka berdua kemudiannya menumpang tinggal di sebuah pondok. Tiara mempunyai suara yang merdu dan dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi di sebuah Syarikat rakaman. Ketika berada di kota, Tiara meminta jasa baik teman lelakinya untuk menguruskan hal ehwal ibunya di kampung. Namun, teman lelakinya itu menyalahgunakan wang yang diberikan oleh Tiara untuk ibunya.

programme.title: Hapuslah Air Matamu
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Aini, seorang penyanyi yang berasal dari kampung yang mula menempah nama selepas menjadi artis rakaman. Bermula sebagai seorang gadis yang sopan dan berbudi pekerti dan turut disokong oleh kekasihnya, Adi sehingga Aini berjaya menjadi penyanyi idaman ramai. Tetapi, Aini mula lupa diri selepas mengecapi kejayaan. Dia kemudiannya diberi peluang berkolaborasi bersama penyanyi terkenal Indonesia, Broery. Setelah itu, Aini menjadi semakin terkenal dan dia mula ditawarkan dengan bayaran yang tinggi untuk persembahannya. Kejayaannya telah mengubah Aini menjadi angkuh dan sombong sehingga dia mula melupakan janji lama dan juga ibunya. Dihina dan dimarahi oleh Aini, ibunya pulang dengan hati yang kecewa lalu jatuh sakit. Dapatkah Aini mengubat luka itu?

programme.title: Balada
programme.desc: Desa mewarisi sebidang tanah hasil penglibatan arwah ayahnya dalam politik tanah air - namun perlu ditebus tanah tersebut. Tidak mahu tanah itu beralih ke tangan orang lain, Desa perlu mencari wang secukupnya. Desa mula berhijrah ke Kuala Lumpur untuk mencari wang dengan bakatnya.

programme.desc: Delivers timely and in-depth coverage of key global events, focusing on international politics, economics, and societal changes, with a spotlight on the latest developments impacting the world today.

programme.title: Raja Nyaman
programme.desc: 10 peserta dari daerah berbeza akan berentap dalam mengetengahkan Sajian Terbaik Sarawak melalui pertandingan realiti yang mencungkil bakat dan kemahiran anak jati Sarawak dalam bidang kulinari makanan tempatan untuk merebut kejuaraan dan dinobatkan sebagai Raja Nyaman!

programme.title: Borneo's Unique Building
programme.desc: Siri dokumentari yang memfokuskan kepada senibina bangunan dan infrastruktur di Sarawak, yang menampilkan dua binaan iaitu satu senibina moden/kontemporari dan satu lagi senibina tradisi/kolonial.

programme.title: Encang Pok Encang
programme.desc: DIN JERES, the school's badminton prodigy is destined to bring glory to his small kampung school. But one day, his shot at badminton glory was mercilessly crushed.

programme.title: (L) TVS Pagi
programme.desc: TVS Pagi membawakan perkembangan menyeluruh dari dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Farmerette
programme.desc: A documentary highlighting the resilience and empowerment of women farmers in Sarawak, showcasing their contributions to agriculture, family, and community growth for a thriving future.

programme.title: (DL) World News
programme.desc: Delivers timely and in-depth coverage of key global events, focusing on international politics, economics, and societal changes, with a spotlight on the latest developments impacting the world today.

programme.title: Lukisan Hati Umar
programme.desc: Umar, seorang budak yang berbakat melukis dan berteman dengan seekor beruk, hidup susah selepas kematian ibunya. Dia terpaksa bekerja memetik kelapa untuk menyara diri, tetapi hasilnya sering dirampas oleh bapa tirinya yang kasar. Cerita ini berkisar cabaran hidup Umar dan usahanya terus bertahan serta mencari harapan dalam kesusahan

programme.title: Reaksiar
programme.desc: Program yang memaparkan perkongsian pengalaman dan reaksi artis-artis jemputan setelah melihat kembali klip-klip lakonan mereka.

programme.title: Istanbul Aku Datang
programme.desc: Seorang gadis muda dari Malaysia pergi ke Istanbul untuk bertemu dengan teman lelaki kesayangannya, namun gadis yang naif itu tidak tahu apa yang akan berlaku kepada kehidupannya di sana.

programme.title: Love Supermoon
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita yang menjalani kehidupan masing-masing tetapi sering bertemu di majlis perkahwinan atau parti yang dianjurkan oleh rakan-rakan mereka. Mereka hanya mengenali antara satu sama lain melalui gosip yang didengar, namun berpura-pura tidak mengenali setiap kali bertemu.

programme.title: One, Two, Trivia
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang merungkai fakta-fakta menarik yang tersimpan dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan

programme.title: Kaki Kitai
programme.desc: Din AKA Drango dan Ayoi adalah dua sahabat yang juga merupakan penipu. Mereka berdua datang ke Kuala Lumpur dan secara tidak sengaja bertemu semula dengan seorang kawan lama yang kini bekerja sebagai pegawai polis. Namun, hidup mereka mula berubah apabila mereka menemui sebuah beg sampah yang dipenuhi dengan wang tunai, yang kemudian mereka gunakan untuk membayar hutang.

programme.title: Ruang Temu
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Tony Eusoff yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan pengalaman beliau di dalam industri seni

programme.title: Made Of Honor
programme.desc: Tom adalah lelaki bujang yang jatuh cinta dengan Hannah, sahabatnya sejak lama. Apabila Hannah bertunang, Tom diminta menjadi maid of honor untuk majlis perkahwinannya. Semasa menjalankan tugasnya, Tom menyedari perasaan cintanya yang sebenar dan cuba memenangi hati Hannah sebelum majlis perkahwinan itu berlangsung.

programme.title: Magika
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua beradik, Ayu dan Malik, yang secara tidak sengaja masuk ke dunia ajaib bernama Magika ketika cuba menyelamatkan roh ibu mereka. Di dunia itu, mereka bertemu watak-watak dongeng Melayu seperti Nenek Kebayan dan Badang, sambil berjuang mencari jalan pulang ke dunia nyata.

programme.title: Dunia Baru The Movie
programme.desc: Filem ini bermula apabila Opie menemui sepucuk surat daripada Anizah yang menyatakan bahawa dia ingin berkahwin dengan teman lelakinya, Fazley, dan telah menguburkan impiannya untuk menyambung pelajaran ke UK.

programme.title: Gerabak Cinta
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Luna, usahawan berjaya yang ditipu tunangnya, Razi. Dia kecewa apabila perniagaan yang mereka usahakan rugi kerana Razi terbabit dengan skandal wang serta mempunyai perempuan simpanan. Sementara itu, Gie pula baru saja dibuang kerja. Walaupun masih mencari kerja, dia sangat tenang dan tetap ceria. Gie reda dengan situasi menimpanya.

programme.title: Syawal Mencari Cinta
programme.desc: Pada pagi Raya, Syawal melepak bersama rakannya dan mereka tidak menunaikan solat sunat Hari Raya. Setelah selesai solat sunat Hari Raya, dia ternampak seorang gadis yang tidak pernah dilihatnya di kampung sebelum ini. Syawal terus berkesimpulan bahawa dia telah menemui cinta sejati. Dia telah mengunjung setiap rumah di kampung untuk menjejaki gadis tersebut. Selepas sekian lama mencari tanpa membuahkan hasil, Syawal terus mengumumkan kepada seluruh kampung bahawa dia akan melaksanakan rumah terbuka untuk hari raya dan semua orang dijemput hadir ke rumahnya. Namun demikian, setelah selesai rumah terbukanya, gadis yang dicari-cari Syawal masih tidak kelihatan. Dia kecewa lalu berputus asa. Tanpa sedar, gadis yang dijejaki selama ini adalah Cinta, sepupunya sendiri.

programme.title: Mat Tudung
programme.desc: Johari, seorang bekas playboy dan Mat Rempit, jatuh hati pada gadis sopan bernama Zizie yang hanya menyukai lelaki berakhlak baik. Untuk menambat hati Zizie, Johari menyamar sebagai “adiknya” Johanna, lalu tercetus pelbagai situasi lucu dan kecoh.

programme.title: Peluang Ketiga
programme.desc: Zulaikha dan Yusuf telah menjalinkan hubungan sejak zaman universiti lagi. Namun, hubungan mereka terputus apabila Yusuf tidak bersetuju dengan keputusan Zulaikha untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi. Zulaikha kemudian bertemu dengan Mikhail, seorang lelaki berhati mulia yang sentiasa menyokong segala impiannya. Sementara itu, Yusuf meneruskan kerjayanya sebagai pelumba basikal profesional dan jatuh cinta dengan seorang wartawan sukan bernama Alya.Namun, apabila Mikhail melamar Zulaikha, hati Yusuf mula dilanda cemburu. Mampukah Yusuf melupakan Zulaikha dan menerima hakikat bahawa cinta mereka mungkin sudah berlalu?

programme.title: Matahari Tak Bercahaya
programme.desc: Telefilem ini mengisahkan Mastura, seorang penjaga taska dan isteri kepada Shazan yang menjalani hidup bahagia di kampung. Namun semuanya berubah selepas satu insiden ketika menerima rawatan di hospital menyebabkan Mastura dijangkiti HIV secara tidak sengaja, lalu hidupnya berubah dari disenangi menjadi dibenci masyarakat kampung

programme.title: Lukisan Hati Umar
programme.desc: Umar, seorang budak yang berbakat melukis dan berteman dengan seekor beruk, hidup susah selepas kematian ibunya. Dia terpaksa bekerja memetik kelapa untuk menyara diri, tetapi hasilnya sering dirampas oleh bapa tirinya yang kasar. Cerita ini berkisar cabaran hidup Umar dan usahanya terus bertahan serta mencari harapan dalam kesusahan

programme.title: Calon Presiden
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Saleha
programme.desc: Saleha mengisahkan seorang gadis baik hati yang ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya dan dibesarkan oleh nenek. Selepas diculik dan kehilangan neneknya, dia dipersalahkan dan dihalau oleh keluarganya. Dengan semangat dan keimanan yang teguh, Saleha memulakan hidup baru di Jakarta sambil menyembunyikan penyakit serius.

programme.title: Jadi Bos Jangan Galak Galak, Gak Bahaya Ta?
programme.desc: Ferdi (Andrew Andika), seorang pegawai polis, bertemu Mirna (ADina Anjani) selepas satu kejadian di jalan raya. Mereka dipertemukan semula di rumah Ferdi, di mana Mirna melindungi dan menyayangi anak Ferdi, Rafa, yang sering dilayan kasar oleh teman wanita Ferdi. Sikap Mirna membuatkan Ferdi kagum dan menimbulkan persoalan, adakah cinta akan terjalin antara mereka.

programme.title: Cinta Di Ujung Sajadah
programme.desc: Rindu dan Fauzan terpaksa berdepan dengan kenyataan pahit apabila penipuan masa lalu Rindu terbongkar. Fauzan yang marah mengusir Rindu keluar dari rumah, dan Rindu berjuang untuk mendapatkan hak penjagaan anak mereka, Ayu. Dalam penyesalan, Fauzan mula menyedari bahawa cintanya terhadap Rindu masih belum padam. Namun, segalanya menjadi rumit apabila Fauzan berkahwin dengan wanita lain bernama Alia. Di sisi lain, Rindu berkenalan dengan Hafiz yang benar-benar menyayanginya.

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Salwa dan Fahri dikurniakan dua cahaya mata iaitu Nayla dan Arsya. Perkahwinan yang pada asalnya penuh kebahagiaan kini berakhir dengan duka apabila Fahri memutuskan untuk meninggalkan keluarganya bagi merantau ke bandar demi mengejar kejayaan. Dalam usaha menyara kedua anaknya, Salwa bekerja keras setelah ditinggalkan suaminya. Namun, keamanan keluarga kecil ini diganggu oleh peristiwa besar yang berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.desc: Saleha mengisahkan seorang gadis baik hati yang ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya dan dibesarkan oleh nenek. Selepas diculik dan kehilangan neneknya, dia dipersalahkan dan dihalau oleh keluarganya. Dengan semangat dan keimanan yang teguh, Saleha memulakan hidup baru di Jakarta sambil menyembunyikan penyakit serius.

programme.title: THE BOYS
programme.desc: 3 boys were imprisoned as murderers. Next year, detective Hwang got a tip and reopen the case. However, he was demoted. 16 years later, the only witness and the boys return to find Hwang.

programme.title: LOVE 911
programme.desc: A doctor tries to woo a grieving, widowed firefighter in her attempt to get him to testify on her behalf in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: HARBIN
programme.desc: In 1908, Ahn Jung-geun and Korean independence fighters win against Japanese army. A year later, they head to Harbin as the Japanese statesman Uto Hirobumi is going for negotiation...

programme.title: THE BAD GUYS: REIGN OF CHAOS
programme.desc: Oh Gu-Tak, the Chief of 'Special Crime Unit' join hands with a former gangster, a con artist and a convicted cop to solve cases. They begin to hunt for the bad guys hidden...

programme.title: REVOLVER
programme.desc: Su-young gets entangled in corruption and takes the blame for a reward. After her release, she finds Andy who promised her the reward but faces a bigger force behind him.

programme.title: DOOR LOCK
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: CONCRETE UTOPIA
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: BEAUTIFUL AUDREY
programme.desc: Mi-yeon and her son Ki-hoon run a noodle restaurant. Her daughter, Ji-eun left for her dream. One day, Mi-yeon is diagnosed with a disease. Will this family be able to protect each other?

programme.title: OH! MY GHOST
programme.desc: FD Taemin meets a female ghost who lives in the studio he works. As mysterious events happened in the studio, they join hands to investigate and protect his job and her sleeping place.

programme.title: STREAMING
programme.desc: Top crime channel streamer Woo Sang goes live to catch a serial killer and reclaim fame—until he learns the killer is watching, turning his hunt into a deadly game.

programme.title: LOVE CLINIQUE
programme.desc: Dong-ju joins school choir for Min-soo even she is tone-deaf. They reunite 10 years later. She wants to impress him so she enrolls in a vocal training clinic where Shin-hong trains her...

programme.title: LOVE RESET
programme.desc: A couple decide to divorce after two years of marriage. They revive a 30-day divorce settlement period from the court, but then they both lost memories after a car accident...

programme.title: DOOR LOCK
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: The cast travels across South Korea, discovering unique culture, nature, magical places, and fascinating people. Each episode features different guests, joining in the joyful journey.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

programme.title: Cha's Family
programme.desc: From Thailand to Japan, the cast explore bold local flavors, craft their own signature spicy sauce, and bring Korea's passion for heat to a global stage—mixing food, culture, and adventure into one sizzling journey.

programme.title: Cha's Family
programme.desc: From Thailand to Japan, the cast explore bold local flavors, craft their own signature spicy sauce, and bring Korea's passion for heat to a global stage—mixing food, culture, and adventure into one sizzling journey.

programme.title: The Genius Paik 2
programme.desc: Top Korean restaurateur chef Paik is back with a team of A-list celebrities, accepting the challenge of starting a Korean restaurant and introducing Korean cuisine to the globe in an unfamiliar country.

programme.title: Muscle Farmers
programme.desc: 5 'muscle farmers' land a helping hand to rural areas that face a labor shortage crisis. Join them in Korea's first agricultural-physical project as they enter the world of farming!

programme.title: Muscle Farmers
programme.desc: 5 'muscle farmers' land a helping hand to rural areas that face a labor shortage crisis. Join them in Korea's first agricultural-physical project as they enter the world of farming!

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea
programme.desc: Yum Jung-ah, Ahn Eun-jin, Park Jun-myun, Dex and special guests are visiting seaside villages in Korea. They will live there and cook fresh seasonal dishes using ingredients from the sea.

programme.title: The Genius Paik 2
programme.desc: Top Korean restaurateur chef Paik is back with a team of A-list celebrities, accepting the challenge of starting a Korean restaurant and introducing Korean cuisine to the globe in an unfamiliar country.

programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: Dear X follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: Dear X follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea
programme.desc: Yum Jung-ah, Ahn Eun-jin, Park Jun-myun, Dex and special guests are visiting seaside villages in Korea. They will live there and cook fresh seasonal dishes using ingredients from the sea.

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: The cast travels across South Korea, discovering unique culture, nature, magical places, and fascinating people. Each episode features different guests, joining in the joyful journey.

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes - from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: Walking Through The Village
programme.desc: Actor Gu Bon-seung shows the warmth and purity of life in the village along the river, and presents how new history was made and became one's memory.

programme.title: Hello Missfortune
programme.desc: In a multidimensional domain, Poon Siu-yu (Erica Chan) enters the second dimension after her death in the first dimension, i.e. the mortal realm. She then joins Office of the Life Authority and becomes a novice “destiny administrator”. Siu-yu has to keep a close watch on food courier Chan Pei-ho (Hubert Wu), who is in the mortal realm. Pei-ho earns a meager living regardless of the weather. But his family members just do not care about him. He is already overwhelmed by life pressures, and he is also jinxed by “bad spirit” Siu-yu while doing his job. Siu-yu gradually sympathizes with Pei-ho. Meanwhile, Pei-ho also realizes this mysterious girl has covertly helped him a lot. The duo then even recklessly start a romantic relationship that is probably going to have no future.

programme.title: Pages Of Treasures
programme.desc: Bookshop staff FONG HOK MAN (Chun Pui) always believes that “knowledge is power”. He tries hard to encourage his older son FONG SUM MING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and his younger son FONG SUM CHING (Suen Eric) to study more. Unfortunately, MING is not good at studying at all and he quits after secondary school. On the other hand, CHING is a very smart boy and MING works hard overseas to support CHING's further studies on computer sciences in America. The two brothers return to Hong Kong eventually and they work in the same commercial building. CHING works as a senior network security engineer while MING works as a junior security guard. MAN worries that the difference in their job ranking will hinder their relationship. MING admires a girl YUEN WAI CHUNG (Kwok Sonija) who opens a paper mud figure shop. MAN tries to help MING establish his career by buying a secondhand bookshop for him to operate. However, MAN doesn't realize that the virtual world is gradually manipulating his family. CHING meets a romanticist TSU HEI MAN (Yeo Vivien) at work which creates misunderstanding between him and his girlfriend, LUI YUEN YI (Yeung Shirley). MAN's younger daughter FONG SUM MEI (Ho Lily) indulges herself in the virtual world and she is suspected for stealing exam papers on the internet…

MAN's younger daughter FONG SUM MEI (Ho Lily) indulges herself in the virtual world and she is suspected for stealing exam papers on the internet…

programme.title: Price Of Greed, The
programme.desc: Police Constable LUI TO (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) is shocked to discover that TSU FUNG (CHAN KIN FUNG, SAMMUL), who has reportedly gone missing for a year, is already dead and that his body has been claimed by his girlfriend LAM PING (TSUI KATE TSZ SHAN). Then, suddenly and mysteriously, FUNG, who is believed to be dead, turns up again, which makes the enigma even more intriguing. The relationship between PING and FUNG is also put to the test amidst such confusion. It is in fact a conspiracy by PING's stepmother and a conman. TO begins to investigate the mystery, which nonetheless places him in great danger and causes him to lose his job. Fortunately, he has YAN YUET-MUI (YEUNG SZE-KI, SHIRLEY), his childhood friend, by his side to help him through his darkest days. PING's family have become entangled in a series of mishaps ever since her marriage to FUNG. What she doesn't know is that eight members of MAO TAI's (CHAN HUNG LIT) con gang have already infiltrated the LAM family…

programme.title: Price Of Greed, The
programme.desc: Police Constable LUI TO (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) is shocked to discover that TSU FUNG (CHAN KIN FUNG, SAMMUL), who has reportedly gone missing for a year, is already dead and that his body has been claimed by his girlfriend LAM PING (TSUI KATE TSZ SHAN). programme.title: Shades of Life
programme.desc: Ko Ba-dou (Yu Yang), a retired school principal with a deep love for traditional Chinese culture, values family ethics and is highly respected by his family. His eldest son, Ko Ho-pan (Wu Nuoyan), a journalism graduate and magazine editor, is a prodigy who seeks to get to the bottom of things. On livelihood issues, he occasionally disagrees with his father, holding different views. Ba-dou and his 40-year-old daughter, Ko Ho-yan (Tam Hoi-kei), face a significant generation gap and struggle to keep up with the ever-changing internet age. Fortunately, his daughter-in-law, Tung Oi-ching (Yiu Chi-ling), manages the household with impeccable organization and is a dedicated supporter of her husband and children.

programme.desc: Police Constable LUI TO (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) is shocked to discover that TSU FUNG (CHAN KIN FUNG, SAMMUL), who has reportedly gone missing for a year, is already dead and that his body has been claimed by his girlfriend LAM PING (TSUI KATE TSZ SHAN). Then, suddenly and mysteriously, FUNG, who is believed to be dead, turns up again, which makes the enigma even more intriguing. The relationship between PING and FUNG is also put to the test amidst such confusion. It is in fact a conspiracy by PING's stepmother and a conman. TO begins to investigate the mystery, which nonetheless places him in great danger and causes him to lose his job. Fortunately, he has YAN YUET-MUI (YEUNG SZE-KI, SHIRLEY), his childhood friend, by his side to help him through his darkest days. PING's family have become entangled in a series of mishaps ever since her marriage to FUNG. What she doesn't know is that eight members of MAO TAI's (CHAN HUNG LIT) con gang have already infiltrated the LAM family…

programme.title: Shades of Life
programme.desc: Ko Ba-dou (Yu Yang), a retired school principal with a deep love for traditional Chinese culture, values family ethics and is highly respected by his family. His eldest son, Ko Ho-pan (Wu Nuoyan), a journalism graduate and magazine editor, is a prodigy who seeks to get to the bottom of things. On livelihood issues, he occasionally disagrees with his father, holding different views. Ba-dou and his 40-year-old daughter, Ko Ho-yan (Tam Hoi-kei), face a significant generation gap and struggle to keep up with the ever-changing internet age. Fortunately, his daughter-in-law, Tung Oi-ching (Yiu Chi-ling), manages the household with impeccable organization and is a dedicated supporter of her husband and children.

programme.title: Hello Missfortune
programme.desc: In a multidimensional domain, Poon Siu-yu (Erica Chan) enters the second dimension after her death in the first dimension, i.e. the mortal realm. She then joins Office of the Life Authority and becomes a novice “destiny administrator”. Siu-yu has to keep a close watch on food courier Chan Pei-ho (Hubert Wu), who is in the mortal realm. Pei-ho earns a meager living regardless of the weather. But his family members just do not care about him. He is already overwhelmed by life pressures, and he is also jinxed by “bad spirit” Siu-yu while doing his job. Siu-yu gradually sympathizes with Pei-ho. Meanwhile, Pei-ho also realizes this mysterious girl has covertly helped him a lot. The duo then even recklessly start a romantic relationship that is probably going to have no future.

programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong
programme.desc: Report important news about Hong Kong, cross-strait, and international affairs.

programme.title: Wudang Rules
programme.desc: Having suffered a traumatic setback, former undercover police officer PAU KAI-CHUNG (Chin Siu Hou) takes shelter in the Wudang Mountains, where he encounters his senior and childhood acquaintance MO YEE-SHAN (Yuen Qiu). YEE-SHAN, who runs a hostel and teaches martial arts, lets KAI-CHUNG stay and work as a chef, above which she also takes in a blockhead of dubious background, HO CHING-TUNG (Derek Kok). Who could have thought a group of Hong Kong Kung Fu students would cause such a stir in this previously peaceful secluded getaway? The students include YEE-SHAN's daughter LOK YEUNG (Tavia Yeung), terminally ill boxing champion CHEUNG KA-KONG (Timmy Hung), wealthy heir LO YIK-HIN (Cheung Wing Hong), private bodyguard YEUNG CHING-WU (Toby Leung) and model SIU YUK (Regen Cheung) etc. It turns out that KAI-CHUNG and LOK YEUNG have already known each other in Hong Kong; whereas LOK YEUNG's sudden appearance triggers his grief-stricken memories. Later on, KAI-CHUNG unveils LOK YEUNG's real purpose which is to convince her mother to sell the hostel to a Hong Kong corporation. Pretending to be injured, YEE-SHAN appoints KAI-CHUNG to succeed her, continuing to teach everyone martial arts. On top of that, she even promises LOK YEUNG that she is going to fulfill her wish if LOK YEUNG is able to win the competition within three months. As the course is drawing to a close, CHING-TUNG suddenly becomes normal, and even recognizes who KAI-CHUNG really is. All of a sudden, the whole Wudang Mountains are on the verge of crisis......

programme.title: Dolce Vita 2021
programme.desc: Hong Kong life is vibrant and diverse, and "Hong Kong Life, Hong Kong Enjoyment" presents both sophisticated and elegant lifestyles and down-to-earth, high-quality experiences. The program combines diverse themes, exploring different areas in each episode and inviting elites from various industries to share their secrets to success.

programme.title: Hands Up 2026
programme.desc: The brand-new children's program “Hands Up” encourages kids to ask questions bravely, express themselves, and pursue their goals! Members of the mascot “Sauce Family” join the hosts in performing short skits, accompanying everyone for joyful moments. The show will also feature a variety of children's songs, allowing kids to sing along while learning practical life knowledge.

programme.title: Big White Duel II
programme.desc: With CE Yeung Yat-to (Kwok Chun On) and Deputy CE Tong Ming (Kenneth Ma) at the helm of the leading public health institution Marshall Paxton Hospital, core departments, namely neurosurgery, CTS and A&E, are writing life-saving medical stories. The failed medical reform plan had not in any way frustrated Yat-to, who puts forward Comprehensive Opening Up of the Drug Formulary Bill with the aim of providing low-cost medications to rare disease patients. However, oncologist Ip Ching (Nancy Wu) objects to his proposal, and she even goes against Yat-to as she is appointed as MarsPax CE. Meanwhile, former W.M.U. member Lee Man-shun (Moses Chan) joins the MarsPax team and collaborates with A&E Dr Zoe So (Natalie Tong), neurosurgeon Lui Oi-ling (Kelly Cheung) and other white knights in handling all kinds of critical situations.

programme.title: Big White Duel II
programme.desc: With CE Yeung Yat-to (Kwok Chun On) and Deputy CE Tong Ming (Kenneth Ma) at the helm of the leading public health institution Marshall Paxton Hospital, core departments, namely neurosurgery, CTS and A&E, are writing life-saving medical stories. The failed medical reform plan had not in any way frustrated Yat-to, who puts forward Comprehensive Opening Up of the Drug Formulary Bill with the aim of providing low-cost medications to rare disease patients. programme.title: Scoop 2026
programme.desc: "Scoop" airs from Monday to Sunday, closely following major social events and interesting stories, while also reporting the latest updates in the entertainment industry, celebrity news, as well as drama promotions and behind-the-scenes features. The "Today's Breaking News" segment keeps viewers up to date with the day's hottest stories. The in-depth feature section explores current affairs, social, and livelihood issues that the public cares about, interviewing relevant experts for their insights.

programme.title: News Treasury 2025
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure trove—if we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. Audiences will have the chance to revisit events such as Bruce Lee's funeral, the Bank of Po Sang robbery, the Gang of Four trial, the Queen's visit to Hong Kong, taxi strikes, the signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, an exclusive interview with Margaret Thatcher, Vietnamese refugees, the death of Governor Youde, Chris Patten's arrival in Hong Kong, the closure of Kai Tak Airport, the passing of Deng Xiaoping, the 1997 Handover Ceremony, the China Airlines Hong Kong crash, and SARS press conferences.

programme.title: Cantopop At 50
programme.desc: Throughout the years, countless hit songs have emerged in both Chinese and international music scenes. Regardless of the era, every work has its own devoted fans. " Cantopop At 50" invites original singers or accomplished vocalists to reinterpret these once-popular classics that transcend generations, delivering high-quality musical enjoyment to music lovers. In addition to featuring influential senior artists in the music industry, the program also welcomes many singers who have not appeared in public for a long time, bringing multiple surprises to the audience.

programme.title: News Magazine 2026
programme.desc: "News Perspective" is a weekly program featuring in-depth coverage of notable news stories from Hong Kong and around the world. It focuses on social issues that matter most to Hong Kong residents and invites people from various sectors, scholars, and experts to discuss and analyze the underlying causes and developments.

programme.title: Home Lovely Home
programme.desc: Hong Kong is a land of scarcity, and many residents live in cramped conditions, with furniture pieced together from various sources and clutter piling up. Economic constraints often prevent them from making improvements. Hosts Sammy and Chong Tsz-shuen specially invited designers to source new furniture and appliances tailored to the needs of different cases, reorganizing and redesigning the homes of selected low-income families to improve their living conditions and bring them a comfortable and joyful home.

programme.title: Music Money Monster
programme.desc: Pushing the limits of vocal range and precise timing, the brand-new interactive music game show Music Money Monster" is hosted by Sammy, Eric Kwok, and Lee Yin-tung. A professional pitch analysis system tests the contestants. A nine-square grid represents nine difficulty levels. Contestants who connect three lines to "pass the level" can choose to withdraw their winnings, continue the challenge, or even attempt the most difficult Monster level. Failure results in zero prize money! The amateur version allows solo participants to compete for a top prize of NT$100,000. The celebrity version offers viewers a chance to win prizes and gifts by interacting with the contestants in the live stream and sending emojis to cheer them on.

programme.title: Mystery Files
programme.desc: Love is an extremely complex subject, surrounded by numerous “environmental factors” that can alter our dreams and understanding of romance. These factors—ranging from changes in age and the rise of internet culture to the emergence of scams and other seemingly unusual reasons—have led to bizarre, worldview-shattering love stories in society. The TVB Plus live show " Mystery Files" hosted by Fire Lee, Jinny Ng, and Randal Tsang, invites people from all walks of life, celebrity guests, and relationship experts to discuss each episode's theme. With unique perspectives and thought-provoking questions, they boldly explore emotional dilemmas, while also welcoming viewers to join the conversation and solve problems together through the live chatroom and call-ins.

programme.title: News Treasury 2025
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure trove—if we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. programme.title: Finance Magazine 2026
programme.desc: "Financial Insights" keeps a close watch on the market, reviewing weekly trends in Hong Kong stocks and paying attention to the real estate sector. Through exclusive interviews with industry professionals and market analysis, the program explores popular local and international finance topics in a clear and accessible manner. It also features in-depth reports on the challenges faced by different industries as they develop.

programme.title: Gourmet Express & Trick Or Cheat
programme.desc: Hong Kong brings together global cuisines, and its unique dishes and down-to-earth fare have captured the close attention of discerning food lovers! Food hosts and presenters such as Icy Wong,Snowy Choi,Carmen Ngai,Carmaney Wong , Jessica Liu , Gillian Ng keep up with the latest food news and deals, delving into the stories behind the flavors. Gathering firsthand information on popular eateries across various platforms, the hosts personally line up and taste the food, providing genuine reviews. Even takeout-only eateries with no dine-in option are in high demand—what are the must-try picks? Running a food business inevitably comes with its own mix of sweet, sour, bitter, and spicy experiences. The production team follows the proprietors through their busy day, from sourcing ingredients and preparing materials to opening for business, uncovering the "stories behind the flavors."

programme.title: News At 18:30
programme.desc: Jade Channel reports important local, cross-strait, and international news every afternoon at 6:30.

programme.title: Sunday Report 2026
programme.desc: " Sunday Report" focuses each week on popular newsmakers with feature reports, or takes a human-centered approach by visiting people from various social strata and industries to explore in depth political, social, and livelihood issues that concern the public.

programme.title: Scoop 2026
programme.desc: "Scoop" airs from Monday to Sunday, closely following major social events and interesting stories, while also reporting the latest updates in the entertainment industry, celebrity news, as well as drama promotions and behind-the-scenes features. The "Today's Breaking News" segment keeps viewers up to date with the day's hottest stories. The in-depth feature section explores current affairs, social, and livelihood issues that the public cares about, interviewing relevant experts for their insights.

programme.title: Midlife, Sing & Shine! 4
programme.desc: " Midlife, Sing & Shine! 4" has officially launched, continuing the success of the previous three seasons and once again providing a stage for singing enthusiasts to pursue their dreams. This season expands its recruitment efforts to North America and Australia, with several TVB artists participating "masked," igniting the flame of music globally and illuminating the hearts of countless dreamers. Stephanie Che continues to host, offering her warm smile to the contestants; Maria Cordero, Chow Kwok-fung, Cheung Ka-tim, Hai-er, and Gu Ya-wei also serve as judges, providing professional feedback and encouragement to the participants. On this new season's stage, everyone will weave an even more moving chapter with music, continuing the heartfelt story of " Midlife, Sing & Shine! 4."

programme.title: Maria's Auspicious Menu 9
programme.desc: Maria's Auspicious Menu 9

programme.title: Star Weekly
programme.desc: The talk show "Star Weekly" invites celebrities and industry leaders each episode, along with entertainment anchors such as Au Wing-Kuen, Hsu Wen-Hsuan, and Wang Chen-Chuan, to share their recent work plans and discuss special topics related to movies, television, and concerts, especially people and events that netizens and friends in the industry are concerned about and discussing! With so much surrounding information, the show features a special "Fact Check" segment, where guests personally respond to various rumors, allowing the parties involved to clarify the truth!

programme.title: Gourmet Express Weekly
programme.desc: Hong Kong is a melting pot of global cuisine! Food anchors and hosts like Carmaney Wong,Carmen Ngai,Gillian Ng stay up-to-date with the latest culinary trends, gathering information on top-rated restaurants from various platforms. The hosts personally sample the food and provide honest reviews; they uncover hidden gems in different districts and invite long-time expatriates to visit their favorite hometown eateries; renowned chefs and food critics also guide the way, offering expert recommendations. The program features a selection of popular restaurants featured in "Food News Report," highlighting their signature dishes and delivering quick deals, ensuring viewers stay up-to-date with the most delicious and affordable dining information.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: Reporting major news from Hong Kong, across the Taiwan Strait, and around the world, as well as sports updates, keeping you informed about important events and trends in the world of sports.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: Urban dwellers often experience a hectic pace of life and high levels of stress, making them more susceptible to health problems. "The Strongest Lifeline" helps you unravel the secrets to good health. To start, the program features a four-episode series on common urban pain issues, covering headaches, shoulder and neck pain, back pain, and joint pain. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of these conditions, as well as physical therapists and exercise specialists to teach appropriate exercises. With the growing trend of integrating Eastern and Western medicine, even American swimming champion Michael Phelps uses cupping therapy to relieve pain. Therefore, each episode also includes traditional Chinese medical diagnosis, complemented by treatments such as acupuncture, cupping, and the “Sanfu” herbal patch therapy, which is especially suitable during the hottest days of summer. In addition, Chinese medicine practitioners share recipes for nourishing soups, all of which can help regulate and improve your health.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Chef's Unexpected Landing: Hakka Kitchen 2 2
programme.desc: Chefs Unexpected Landing: Hakka Kitchen 2 unites Leeteuk, James, and a lineup of Korean and Taiwanese celebrities to create inventive Hakka-Korean fusion dishes. Using traditional Hakka ingredients with Korean flavours, the team tests their creations through pop-ups and food trucks in Korea. 2

programme.title: Girls Tease
programme.desc: This show focuses on the issues that are most important to urban modern women. It combines current events with discussions of life's major and minor problems and invites various specialists to address various difficulties. Netizens will occasionally attend the show to share their own stories and ask questions of the guests and experts, making the topics more relevant and audience-focused!

programme.title: Just for You
programme.desc: Two brothers, living just 300 meters apart, lead vastly different lives. The elder, Kai-Teng Chiao, a former athlete turned plumber, gave up his dreams to support his family and finds unexpected healing through a connection with a distant, cold-hearted prosecutor. Meanwhile, the younger, Hsi-Ming Chiao, a successful lawyer, is forced to confront the painful past he buried, which includes his breakup and his fathers suicide, when he meets Pao-Chi Hsu, the woman who holds the key to the memories he lost a decade ago.

programme.title: Top Singers
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.desc: It is more than just a food and travel show as it is a cultural journey. The program blends travel, cuisine, and culture, inviting viewers not only to taste but also to experience the stories, people, and places behind Taiwanese food and destinations. Through lively food challenges, scenic explorations, and authentic local encounters, the hosts bring audiences closer to Taiwans diverse flavors and vibrant traditions.

programme.title: Mr.Player
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Rainy Night Flower
programme.desc: After leaving reformatory, Xin Xiong joins a gang to make a living and soon he becomes a leader of the gang. He takes protection fees from vendors and works hard to 'maintain the local order' in his way. He has thus developed a very good relationship with the law enforcement unit. Later, a teahouse owner Gui Zhu has fallen in love with Xin Xiong who loves Yue Gui. The triangle relationship is entangled with jealousy.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Battle Tour
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in! PK

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: Wei Xiao Bao is sent by a revolutionary group to be a spy in the imperial palace and find “The Sutra of 42 Chapters”. Xiao Bao soon befriends Emperor Kang Xi but must carry out his mission at the same time, so he is caught between two camps.

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad members—Tai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tang—are involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his son's talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Battle of the Wolf
programme.desc: On his flight home, former special forces sergeant Zhang Zhi Yong and his wife find themselves caught in a terrorist conspiracy masterminded by international criminals. Drawing on his unwavering courage and tactical expertise, he protects his wife and fellow passengers while dismantling the deadly plot and ensuring everyone's safe return home.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: The Unwavering Brotherhood
programme.desc: The revered elder of a triad gang faces succession uncertainty when his three trusted underlings—Hua, Fei, and Guo—are robbed while transporting gang money. Determined to redeem himself, Hua vows to track down the robbers. However, when Hua discovers that Fei and Guo are connected to the robbery, he must choose between loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Guilt By Design
programme.desc: On the final day of a shocking murder trial in Hong Kong, a renowned hypnotherapist serving as a juror receives a video showing his daughter being kidnapped. The abductors demand that he hypnotize the jury to manipulate the final verdict. Torn between justice and family, he must decide how far he is willing to go to save her.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons - a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of “Young and Dangerous”, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a “marriage cooling-off period” to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong's Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai. The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific. Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Feng, a homeless man, is wrongly accused of robbery and subsequently arrested and imprisoned. The actual bandit bribes fellow inmate Yang, a pickpocket, to kill Feng. Aware of Feng's innocence, Yang resolves to help him escape from prison. However, their escape attempt goes awry, and both find themselves facing the grim reality of death row.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire's Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin's daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider's look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang's popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Ming's guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancée Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family's young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo's stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Paap O Meter
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.desc: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer
programme.desc: In a world where magic is waning and technology prevails, 15-year-old Jennifer Strange runs a magician employment agency and discovers the last dragon is being hunted.

programme.desc: A historic space launch triggers a solar-storm event that could have cataclysmic repercussions for the planet if it isn't stopped in time - and time is running out.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Paranormal enthusiasts Abby, Erin, Jillian and Patty set out to capture ghosts when they realise that someone is attempting to cause an apocalypse by summoning ghosts in the city of New York.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: In *Oblivion*, Tom Cruise stars as a man on a journey of redemption in a future Earth. Directed by the creator of *TRON: Legacy*, it's a visually stunning sci-fi adventure about confronting the past to save humanity.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx leads an elite FBI team to hunt a terrorist in Saudi Arabia in The Kingdom—a tense clash of cultures and justice, directed by Peter Berg and produced by Michael Mann.

programme.title: The Librarian: The Return To King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: Adventurer Flynn Carsen receives a secret map to King Solomon's Mines. When the map is stolen, Flynn sets out to find the map and the Key of Solomon's book, without which the map is useless anyway.

programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's 8th film takes place in wintry Wyoming, where eight strangers, including two bounty hunters and a wanted fugitive, find themselves battling the elements and each other.

programme.title: Rambo 3
programme.desc: Combat has taken its toll on Rambo, but he's finally begun to find inner peace in a monastery. When Rambo's friend and mentor Col. Trautman asks for his help on a top secret mission to Afghanistan, Rambo declines but must reconsider when Trautman is captured.

programme.title: Anton and Giovanni's Adventures in Sicily
programme.desc: For the final part of their trip around Sicily, Anton and Giovanni make their way to Gio's hometown of Palermo, stopping along the way to meet some beer-brewing monks.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed
programme.desc: Feel the burn at a state-of-the-art gym that used to be a psychiatric hospital and see a climbing complex that once was a sugar refinery.

programme.title: Wild Japan
programme.desc: The northern island of Hokkaido swings from Siberia-like winters to Mediterranean-like summers. Everything living on Japan's wildest island needs to be extra resilient to survive.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is Arabia's most remarkable treasure. It is a land of surprising beauty filled with unexpected natural wonders, home to some of the rarest animals on Earth - the Arabian Leopard, Arabian Oryx, Green and Hawksbill Turtles - and many more creatures including Arabian Fox, Striped Hyena, Whale Sharks and other sea creatures. Oman's landscape is as diverse as the variety of unique creatures that it supports.

programme.title: Into the Congo with Ben Fogle
programme.desc: Ben heads deeper into the vast Congo wilderness to fulfil his life-long dream of seeing wild gorillas. He discovers a region experiencing rapid change.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is the Middle East's best kept secret. It is a corner of Arabia of unparalleled beauty and unexpected landscapes. It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
programme.desc: With rare access to electronics giant Samsung, Hannah uncovers the technological game changers that have made the smartphone a reality.

programme.title: Extreme Treks
programme.desc: Join Ryan and his team as they continue the mammoth trek that began in Vaduz, Liechtenstein, meeting a fascinating collection of characters along their path, as they draw ever closer to their goal of arriving in Montreux on the shores of Lake Geneva, in this double episode of Extreme Treks.

programme.title: Into the Congo with Ben Fogle
programme.desc: Ben heads deeper into the vast Congo wilderness to fulfil his life-long dream of seeing wild gorillas. He discovers a region experiencing rapid change.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories
programme.desc: Starting in the busy container port and tea centre of Dubai, a tea hub where millions of tonnes of tea are traded from east to west, we move in Fujian Province to witness the beautiful natural withering process of White Tea, increasing in popularity in China and around the world.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
programme.desc: With rare access to electronics giant Samsung, Hannah uncovers the technological game changers that have made the smartphone a reality.
